name: LD44 - Wizard of Worth
description:
Help the wizard defeat the demons and their minions with nothing but a pocket full of change!  

  • Move the wizard to avoid minions.
  • The demon cannot be destroyed!  The minions can be killed.
  • Move your mouse to tell the wizard where to shoot. Use the left mouse button to fire pennies at the minions.

Collect coins within 5 seconds to build up your net worth... 2 pennies per coin!

The game is over when you  are attacked by a minion or demon.

This is my Ludum Dare 44 Entry for the theme "Your Life is Currency".
